name: Blood: Cryptic Passage
description:
Blood: Cryptic Passage is an action-shooter game developed by Sunstorm Interactive and WizardWorks. It came out on 01-01-1997. WizardWorks published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Blood: Cryptic Passage is available on PC.
George Broussard and Matt Saettler produced the game. Nick Newhard directed the game. It was scored by Daniel Bernstein and Guy Whitmore.
